nodes.text: Hellip was an male fleet commander who served in the New Republic's fleet during the Galactic Civil War. In 5 ABY, the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing's attacked the planet Chadawa as part of a second Operation: Cinder against break away Imperial groups. New Republic forces led by General Hera Syndulla intervened the attack and helped drive off the loyalist Imperial forces of the 204th. Following the battle, Syndulla handed over control of local operations to Hellip, who had the task of dealing with the battle's aftermath, including violence that had broken out on several continents, an Imperial government that was still in place, and radiation that was spilled during the 204th's attempts to devastate the world, though the latter issue was limited to unoccupied regions.
Hellip was mentioned in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
